title: Blue Ridge Parkway: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â    The official Blue Ridge Parkway map can be printed off of our website, as well as obtained and at any of our visitor centers when you come to the Parkway. When the map appears, use the snapshot "camera" tool to highlight a portion of the map to print.   Real Time Road Closure Map It is important to know if the Parkway is open before you visit, especially between November and March. Be sure to check the status of the motor road on our real time road closures map.    Hiking Maps We have over 360 miles of trails on the Parkway. Our hiking page has a list of maps of trails along the Parkway.
